title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Algebra Fundamentals in Daily Life Contexts for Individuals with Intellectual and Developmental Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) and experience with simple financial transactions
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve problems using linear equations in at least three everyday contexts (e.g., discount calculations, budget allocation).
Learners can make optimal decisions by applying algebraic thinking to presented financial scenarios (e.g., analyzing pay stubs).
Learners can analyze and explain the structure of mathematical problems using visual aids (e.g., graphs, tree diagrams).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
